about_the_game:
20+ Beautiful Girl Characters

Engage in battles with over 20 uniquely designed and distinctively styled beautiful girl characters. Each victory unlocks their exclusive gallery, offering a visual feast.

Poker Rules and Card Types

Utilizing classic poker rules, the game is easy to pick up but rich in strategic depth. Players can flexibly adjust and build their decks to create highly destructive card combinations. With carefully designed strategies, a single hand can play dozens or even hundreds of cards, providing an unprecedented gaming experience and challenge.

120 Joker Cards

The game includes 120 unique Joker cards, each granting special abilities. Joker cards can produce unique effects when played or alter the rules when building decks, enhancing the game's depth. The high synergy among Joker cards creates astonishing card combinations.

short_description: Engage in adrenaline-pumping card battles with 20+ beautiful girls! Use the quirky Joker cards to transform your poker deck, or achieve record-breaking scores with unique card combinations. After conquering the challenges, unlock a stunning gallery of the girls' exquisite artwork!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, German
